rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0001
rows.name: Hana-chan...

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0002
rows.name: Yes?

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0003
rows.name: I was just thinking how curious it is.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0004
rows.name:
Even though you look completely
different, you're still the same Hana-chan.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0005
rows.name:
Hana very strange.
Even Tora think so sometimes.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0006
rows.name: Even though you made her?

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0007
rows.name: That right!

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0008
rows.name: She grew so much, BAM! All at once!

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0009
rows.name:
Perhaps friends could call Hana by
her model name?

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0010
rows.name: Very good idea.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0011
rows.name: What do you mean by model name?

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0012
rows.name:
Well, Hana's smallest mode
actually has name: "Hana JS".

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0013
rows.name: Oh really? I didn't know that.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0014
rows.name:
And this form called
"Hana Justice Knight Mode".

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0015
rows.name: Wow, that is a very impressive name!

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0016
rows.name:
If friends refer to Hana-chan as "Hana
Justice Knight" when in this
form, Hana will be very happy.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0017
rows.name: Justice Knight Hana-chan... isn't that difficult to say?

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0018
rows.name: Justice Knight Hana

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0019
rows.name:
True true, it difficult to say! Distinction
of Hanas maybe too hard now.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0020
rows.name: Really?

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0021
rows.name:
Yes. In fact, Tora work secretly on
even more improved mode for Hana.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0022
rows.name:
When that finished, must differentiate
between whole three different modes.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0023
rows.name: But that far too much bother!

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0024
rows.name: "Hana"!

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0025
rows.name: That nice and simple, best way to call.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0026
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0027
rows.name: I agree.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0028
rows.name: What's Hana's third mode like?

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0101
rows.name: Yeah, I think Hana-chan suits her just fine.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0102
rows.name: It's short, and easy to understand.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0103
rows.name:
And besides, no matter how she
looks, she's still the same Hana-chan.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0104
rows.name: That is what you said before.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0105
rows.name:
Hana has no problem with
being called Hana.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0106
rows.name: Good good.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0107
rows.name: We came full circle.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0108
rows.name:
Masterpon, Hana is curious. What
is new mode of Hana like?

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0201
rows.name: That excellent question!

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0202
rows.name:
It called "Quantum
Technochampion Ï€"!

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0203
rows.name: That is another very impressive name!

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0204
rows.name: It sound powerful.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0205
rows.name:
Name came to Tora suddenly when he
decide whether to enter swimming pool
with left or right foot.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0206
rows.name:
Name origin story sound
completely irrelevant.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0207
rows.name:
So...how exactly are you going to
remodel Hana-chan?

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0208
rows.name: Tora not decided yet.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0209
rows.name: Oh, really?

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0210
rows.name: Name only first step in process.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0211
rows.name:
Sounds like it not happen
any time soon.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0212
rows.name: It not take that long!

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0213
rows.name:
Tora brainstorm day and night.
Suddenly one day new design will
appear like ether bulb over head!

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0214
rows.name: That just how inventors do.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0215
rows.name: If Masterpon say so...

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0216
rows.name:
When inspiration strike, Masterpon
power up Hana ASAP. Please, trust
in Masterpon!

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0217
rows.name:
Understood. But if Hana had breath,
Hana would not hold it.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0218
rows.name: You not trust Masterpon at all!

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0219
rows.name:
*giggle*
Appearances may change, but Hana-chan
will always be Hana-chan, huh?
